credentials: PHD 2001 Louisiana State U & A&M Colg
name: NAZAN GILLIE

ratings.comment: The quizzes in her Marine Biology course are BS. Half the time it's something that wasn't covered in the material, the other half there just isn't a correct answer. Also, you can't go back over a question after you answer it. All of that would be infuriating but understandable. But this prof has the GALL to say she doesn't have tests, massive lie

I took Marine Biology with her and LOVED IT! She is super kind and easy to communicate with and the material was very interesting. The expectations of the the course are very clear. Each week: one discussion, 300 word writing assignment, activity and quiz. No exams. Highly suggest taking marine biology with her if you can! You won't regret it!!
